DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study 1 > compare neointimal stent coverage OCT-guided vs. Angio-guided PCI , 2 > compare neointimal stent coverage 3 month EES vs BES implantation , 3 > determine duration dual antiplatelet therapy OCT measurement 3 month
DOC.brief_title: DETErmination Duration Dual Antiplatelet Therapy Degree Coverage The Struts Optical Coherence Tomography From Randomized Comparison Between Everolimus-eluting Stents ( EES ) Versus Biolimus A9-eluting Stents ( BES )
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥ 20 year old Patients ischemic heart disease consider coronary revascularization stent implantation . Significant coronary de novo lesion ( stenosis > 70 % quantitative angiographic analysis ) treat single DES ≤ 25mm Reference vessel diameter 2.5 3.5 mm operator assessment Complex lesion morphology arotaostial , unprotected leave main , chronic total occlusion , graft , thrombosis , restenosis Reference vessel diameter < 2.5 mm > 4.0mm Heavy calcify lesion ( definite calcify lesion angiogram ) Primary PCI STEMI Contraindication antiplatelet agent Treated DES within 3 month vessel Creatinine level ≥ 2.0 mg/dL ESRD Severe hepatic dysfunction ( 3 time normal reference value ) Pregnant woman woman potential childbearing Life expectancy < 1 year
